file_content.text: Everyone's saying Nalen went crazy. Who can you trust anymore?
They found Nalen's body. Someone said he died fighting thirty Flesh Raiders, can you believe it?
I thought I told you to leave.
Sorry. Got a whole festival to keep organized.
Break out another cask. Or three. The festival only comes once a year; our stores can take it.
Just as well. We have an uninvited guest.
I see. Festival of Awakening, Jedi. You're not welcome here.
I apologize for interrupting. Master Yuon Par asks if you've seen a Jedi holoprojector.
Sorry, but my Master sent me.
Huh. If Yuon Par's asking, guess we could try and remember.
What's the "Festival of Awakening"? It sounds like fun.
You're having a party?
It is, and Jedi aren't invited.
This is a Jedi world. I'll come and go as I please.
I can go where I like.
What were you expecting, Bashenn, an apology?
What do you want?
Someone took a Jedi relic from the Gnarls, a holoprojector. I was hoping you might have seen it.
I need your help.
I think someone brought an ancient Jedi holoprojector here. Its information could be harmful.
I seek a dangerous artifact.
We know dangerous, Jedi. This is our one day to forget it.
A valuable Jedi holoprojector has been stolen. I want it, and the name of whoever took it.
I'm hunting a thief.
We don't steal! We salvage!
A holoprojector. Yeah, I know what you mean. Nalen found one--Nalen Raloch. Maybe you've heard of him.
Sorry. I've only just arrived on this world.
I'm new to Tython.
I haven't, but it sounds like he has a reputation.
No, but please explain.
If Nalen took the holoprojector, he's a thief. What else is there to know?
I don't care who he is.
Nalen Raloch. Our dueling champion for nine years straight. He once rescued an entire scouting party from Flesh Raiders, single-handed.
He planned our defenses. Protects us when we go foraging. Without him, we wouldn't even be having the festival.
And no, I'm not telling you where he is. Nalen earns his peace and quiet.
That hologram's data isn't safe; Nalen should be warned. Or do you want to risk something happening to him?
But he could be in danger.
Nalen can take care of himself.
Against Flesh Raiders, sure. But some of that Jedi tech is weird.
If you help me find that holoprojector, the Jedi Council will hear of it. And we're generous to our friends.
The Jedi would be grateful....
You expect us to believe that?
Bashenn, if the Jedi offer you a favor, you say "yes"!
You have a choice. Either point me in Nalen's direction, or this festival will be memorable for all the wrong reasons.
You're making me very angry.
You wouldn't. Not on festival day--there's children here!
Just tell her, Bashenn, so she can get out.
Just tell him, Bashenn, so he can get out.
Okay, fine. Nalen went into the Flesh Raiders' territory. He's probably still there; he's been gone a while.
Then I should look for him. Enjoy your festival.
Thank you.
Like you care. Just leave.
I thought this was a special day. Shouldn't he be here celebrating?
He's not at your festival?
Look, you got what you came for, Jedi. Just leave.
Nalen just... likes to be alone these days. And festivals aren't really his thing.
Though last year, he did the Waker's Dance with the rest of us.
I think Nalen's got a camp out there. If you see him, tell him to be back for the feast.
Next time, try giving a simple answer. You'll save everyone a lot of time.
There, that wasn't so hard.
Whatever. Just go.
I'm a little busy here.
